channel.title: Stuff.co.nz - Stuff
channel.description: Top Stories from Stuff.co.nz. New Zealand, world, sport, business & entertainment news on Stuff.co.nz.

item.title: Covid-19 live: Jacinda Ardern announces alert level decision, after 22 new community cases
item.description: The Prime Minister is set to announce if Auckland and the rest of the country will be moving alert levels at 4pm, following the discovery of 22 new Covid cases.
item.dc:creator: Stuff

item.title: Covid-19: Where exactly are Waikato's new coronavirus hotspots?
item.description: The new Covid sites sit just south of Auckland's border with Waikato.
item.dc:creator: AARON LEAMAN

item.title: Covid-19: Eliminating Delta from community hard but still feasible, experts say
item.description: Giving up on "stamp it out" strategy would see Covid-19 outbreak reach levels Victoria and New South Wales In Australia are seeing, experts say.
item.dc:creator: DANIELLE CLENT

item.title: Covid-19: 22 new cases ahead of alert level decision for Auckland
item.description: Health officials link truck driver, recent mystery Middlemore cases to outbreak ahead of alert level decision on whether to move Auckland from level 4.
item.dc:creator: HANNAH MARTIN

item.title: Winched to safety: how a locator beacon saved John Tame's life
item.description: Lost in the bush and hypothermic, John Tame hallucinated an igloo and a visitor centre. Injured after a fall, he needed help fast.
item.dc:creator: KATIE TOWNSHEND

item.title: Sexual health expert calls for accelerated effort to eliminate syphilis and HIV
item.description: Sexual health expert says it's vital for NZ to tackle the potentially deadly conditions, especially among gay and bisexual men.
item.dc:creator: STEPHEN FORBES LOCAL DEMOCRACY REPORTER

item.title: Ariki throw weight behind push for Māori to get vaccinated, to protect their whakapapa
item.description: “Now is the time when we must consider how we protect ourselves, our whānau, our whakapapa and everything about te iwi Māori."
item.dc:creator: MAXINE JACOBS

item.title: Manawatū pioneer in education for young Māori dies
item.description: Joan Kennett worked in early childhood centres for more than 50 years.
item.dc:creator: GEORGE HEAGNEY

item.title: Covid-19 vaccine: Fewer than 27k doses given on Sunday amid push to get Akl jabbed
item.description: Everything you need to know about New Zealand's Covid-19 vaccine programme, including details on when you can expect your jab.
item.dc:creator: HANNAH MARTIN

item.title: Business boss facing dozens of sex charges sees new allegations laid against him
item.description: The man, a chief executive of a Christchurch-based company, faces more than 50 charges, including filming himself sexually violating a child.
item.dc:creator: JODY O'CALLAGHAN

item.title: Veteran Southland firefighters remember the days of using water buckets
item.description: Two veteran firefighters, with a combined service of more 100 years in northern Southland, remember when they started with the bucket brigade in the 1960s.
item.dc:creator: JAMIE SEARLE

item.title: Covid-19: Sacked border worker didn't give a reason for not having vaccine
item.description: A Customs worker who lost her job for failing to have the Covid-19 vaccine, and is now challenging this in the High Court, won't say why she refused the jab.
item.dc:creator: WELLINGTON HIGHER COURTS REPORTER

item.title: Kiwi Jessica Hobbs wins best director Emmy Award for work on drama series The Crown
item.description: The Christchurch-born director made special mention of her mother and the trailblazing work of her fellow female filmmakers in her Emmy Award winner speech.
item.dc:creator: DAVID SKIPWITH

item.title: More than one in 10 emergency department patients do not wait
item.description: Palmerston North Hospital's emergency department has set a monthly record for walkouts.
item.dc:creator: JANINE RANKIN

item.title: Covid-19: Mum did 'happy dance' after nabbing coveted MIQ spot for three kids stuck in NSW
item.description: Ruth Fulford's three kids have been in Australia since July but will be home for Christmas.
item.dc:creator: BRITTNEY DEGUARA

item.title: Covid-19: Man charged over travel from Auckland to Wellington in lockdown denied bail
item.description: A man and woman charged over an alleged lockdown breach have been granted name suppression – but one has lost their freedom.
item.dc:creator: WELLINGTON DISTRICT COURTS REPORTER

item.title: Geraldine beats Cambridge in sudden death to take senior women's hockey championship
item.description: Geraldine are the South Canterbury women's hockey champions after securing a tense win over Cambridge.
item.dc:creator: SHOURABH VITTALMURTHY

item.title: NZ Breakers part ways with Tai Webster because of Covid-19 vaccination stance
item.description: Kiwi ANBL club confirms star off-season re-signing won't line up for the 2021-22 season.
item.dc:creator: MARC HINTON

item.title: Saliva testing now available for Timaru border workers
item.description: PrimePort Timaru started offering the method last week.
item.dc:creator: ESTHER ASHBY-COVENTRY

item.title: Police name young woman who died to Manawatū crash
item.description: Palmerston North's Victoria Vivian is the person who died in a crash at Newbury earlier this month.
item.dc:creator: GEORGE HEAGNEY
